school_story_1_screen_text1: PLZ_CHECK Money is really just pieces of paper. Its us humans who have decided what money should be worth.
school_story_1_screen_text2: PLZ_CHECK Money is what is called a legal tender.
school_story_1_screen_text3: PLZ_CHECK In the past, when there was no money, people exchanged things with eachother. It was called barter!
school_story_1_screen_text4: PLZ_CHECK Have you possibly exchanged something with a friend or sibling?
school_story_1_screen_text5: PLZ_CHECK If you were good at baking bread and lived in a village in the past, but wanted meat as well, you could exchange your bread for meat with a butcher.
school_story_1_screen_text7: PLZ_CHECK But you couldn't exchange one loaf of bread for just anything, some things were worth more.
school_story_1_screen_text8: PLZ_CHECK What do you think is worth more?
school_story_1_screen_text11: PLZ_CHECK If you wanted to exchange bread for something that was worth more, you would have to agree with the other vendor how many loaves of bread it was worth.
school_story_1_screen_text12: PLZ_CHECK But how would you calculate it?
school_story_1_screen_text13: PLZ_CHECK Well, the worth of things is usually determined by how expensive the raw materials or parts of it are.
school_story_1_screen_text14: PLZ_CHECK To bake bread you need flour, jeast, water and maybe some other things.
school_story_1_screen_text15: PLZ_CHECK Those are the raw materials for bread.
school_story_1_screen_text16: PLZ_CHECK Another example is fabric and thread to sew clothes. And the raw materials for clothes are more expensive than the raw materials for bread.
school_story_1_screen_text17: PLZ_CHECK But when determining the value you also have to take into account how hard it is and how long it takes to make.
school_story_1_screen_text18: PLZ_CHECK ...in our example, it takes longer time to sew a pair of pants than baking a loaf of bread.
school_story_1_screen_text19: PLZ_CHECK So if you had bread but wanted to barter for a pair of pants, you would have to exchange a couple of loaves for the other person to be satisfied.
school_story_1_screen_text20: PLZ_CHECK Today, there are also some other things to take into account when you determine or calculate value. But we will talk about that some other time!
school_story_1_screen_text21: PLZ_CHECK These were the basics to what money and value is.
school_screen_button5: I don't want any more pants
